price: Биз катта ушлаш билан ушлайдиган кунда. Албатта, Биз қасос олгувчидирмиз.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yawma nabṭishu al-baṭshata al-kub'rā innā muntaqimūna
